title: 2×2 Matrix Inverse Quiz
description: Test your ability to find inverses of 2×2 matrices using the formula.

questions.question: For which 2×2 matrix does the inverse not exist?
questions.explanation: Matrix [1 2; 2 4] has det = 0, so it's singular.

questions.question: What is the first step in finding a 2×2 inverse?
questions.explanation: First check if det ≠ 0, then use the formula.

questions.question: What is the inverse of the identity matrix I₂?
questions.explanation: The inverse of the identity matrix is itself.

questions.question: In the 2×2 inverse formula, what replaces the diagonal elements?
questions.explanation: The diagonal elements are swapped in the formula.
